Explanations about Options.--no-post-overwrites:
Do not overwrite post-processed files; the post-processed files are overwritten by
 default
Explanations about Options.-o: Output filename template, see the "OUTPUT TEMPLATE" for all the info
Explanations about Options.--download-archive:
Download only videos not listed in the archive file. Record the IDs of all
 downloaded videos in it.
Explanations about Options.--audio-format:
Specify audio format: "best", "aac", "flac", "mp3", "m4a", "opus", "vorbis", or
 "wav"; "best" by default; No effect without -x
Explanations about Options.-c:
Force resume of partially downloaded files. By default, youtube-dl will resume
 downloads if possible.
Explanations about Options.-i: Continue on download errors, for example to skip unavailable videos in a playlist
